creator: fuzzeecueball
title: Paper Note ~ A Tangible Paper Waveform
description: Paper Note is a project that turns sound into a 3D tangible paper waveform sculpture. It analyzes a recorded sound, maps it into a waveform, and transforms each sample point into a paper disk, with the disk size representing the volume at that point. The final sculpture is approximately 14cm in size.
steps: Analyze the recorded sound using the Processing program.
Map the sound into a waveform of 450 sample points using the program.
Transform each sample point into a paper disk, with the disk size representing the volume of the recording at that point (louder volume = bigger disk).
Use the program to scale the physical waveform to a sculpture size of approximately 14cm.
Use a laser cutter to cut out the paper disks.
Assemble the paper disks using string to create the 3D tangible paper waveform sculpture.
